::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/Surgital::

Triggerhappy's finger moved =
to pull the trigger.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight, waiting for death=
.  But nothing happened.  She opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hit, and f=
ell to his knees, mouth wide open, shocked, and in pain.  

"You....." Trig=
gerhappy stopped to gasped for air, "Pile of......."

Triggerhappy fell dow=
n on his face, so he was laying on the ground.  Where his face was, a puddl=
e of mechfluid appeared, and mechfluids started spilling from where he had =
been hit.  The punctures in his metal started to turn into cracks, and mech=
fluid came out.

Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee watched as Triggerhappy had been=
 supposedly defeated.

"NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.

Skullgrin =
transformed into Pretender mode, and had his massive, freaky club.  He ran =
at AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to AzureBlade's head.  Jume and Whee =
fired at AzureBlade.

"No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak yelled.

A light came int=
o her optics, and then she quickly got up and dove at AzureBlade, trying to=
 take him down, but out of the way of damage...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Surgital su=
ddenly felt something from Ice.  The mind thing.  Pain.  

"No........not t=
his.......I thought I had forgot about this!" Surgital said, but which Bodi=
con was saying it, nobody knew.

Surgital didn't feel physical pain, but a =
flashback showed up, and would be visible in the minds of both Ice and all =
the Bodicons.  It was a flashback from Decapitron!  

Flashback:  Decapitro=
n was tied to a conveyer belt, with some sort of energon rope.  He was horr=
ified, and was screaming for help.  Then, he went forward, and a bunch of s=
aws and stuff came down!  They started cutting at Decapitron.  All he could=
 do was scream in sheer pain.  Each saw blade had the Autobot symbol engrav=
ed on it.  Decapitron, still tied onto the conveyer belt, was now heading i=
nto a large box thing.  On the way, a heavy thing with an Autobot symbol ca=
me down and sort of crushed Decapitron's head.  Then, Decapitron went into =
the box thing, which also had an Autobot symbol, and then the doors of the =
box shut, and then Decapitron was stuck, and he was getting beaten and batt=
ered.  After the 10 minute torture process was done in the box, Decapitron =
kept going.  Mechfluid and oil and stuff were pouring like mad, and he was =
mangled and dislocated and stuff.  Finally, he was at the end, and was dump=
ed off of the conveyer belt and onto the ground.  The last thing he had see=
n back then when that happened, was Autobots around him, laughing sinisterl=
y with evil eyes and faces.  
*Flashback Ends*

Surgital was still...
